snippet: As many as three football players at the United States Naval Academy may soon face criminal charges in the case of the alleged serial sexual assault of a female midshipman in 2012.
abstract: As many as three United States Naval Academy football players may face criminal charges in case of alleged serial sexual assault of female midshipman in 2012.
lead_paragraph: As many as three football players at the United States Naval Academy may soon face criminal charges in the case of the alleged serial sexual assault of a female midshipman in 2012.

headline.main: Maryland: Rape Inquiry at Naval Academy Advances
headline.print_headline: Maryland: Rape Inquiry at Naval Academy Advances
